resources.string: Decode Key(only support Numbers or English letter)

There are many applications or softwares to ensure that only the owner can access his messaging box to read the message or mail by adding a password to his box, but this tech can’t ensure the message is safe from being read without permission when the message is sending from the owner to the receiver , and can’t ensure the message will not be read by others when this message in his receiver’s messaging box.

So this why you need this application, this application will rewrite the content of your message depend on the key you provide (this process we call encode).and rewrited content will be rewrite back to the original content if the key you provide is the same with the earlier one.(this process we call decode). So if you do encode before you send the message , no matter where your message is ,you message only can be read by the people who know the key of this message .
This application is owner by XD Studio , If you have any questions about this application you can contract with us.(Email:xdstudio2008@gmail.com)
change the default key use to decode or encode
